author: cnbc.com
title: Chico's FAS, Inc. Announces Fourth Quarter Sales and Earnings Conference Call
text:
FORT MYERS, Fla., Feb. 12, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Women's specialty retailer Chico's FAS, Inc. (NYSE: CHS) will host a conference call with security analysts on Wednesday, February 28, 2018 beginning at 8:30 a.m. EST to review the operating results for the fourth quarter ended February 3, 2018.
The conference call is being webcast live over the Internet, which you may access in the Investors section of the Chico's FAS, Inc. corporate website, www.chicosfas.com .
The phone number for the call is 1-877-883-0383. International callers should use 1-412-902-6506. The Elite Entry number, 3529024, is required to join the conference call. Interested participants should call 10-15 minutes prior to the 8:30 a.m. start in order to be placed in queue.
ABOUT CHICO'S FAS, INC.
The Company, through its brands – Chico's, White House Black Market and Soma, is a leading omni-channel specialty retailer of women's private branded, sophisticated, casual-to-dressy clothing, intimates, and complementary accessories.
As of October 28, 2017, the Company operated 1,474 stores in the US and Canada and sold merchandise through franchise locations in Mexico. The Company's merchandise is also available at www.chicos.com , www.chicosofftherack.com , www.whbm.com and www.soma.com . For more detailed information on Chico's FAS, Inc., please go to our corporate website at www.chicosfas.com .
Executive Contact:
Julie Lorigan
Vice President – Investor Relations, Public Relations
& Corporate Communications
Chico's FAS, Inc.
(239) 346-4199
